inclusion.criterion: T2DM with no change in type/dose of diabetic medication in the last 3 months
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Creatinine (up to 60 years) level between 0.57 - 1.36 mg/dL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Satisfactory haematological or biochemical functions tests only
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject is willing to comply with study procedures and is able to return to the clinic for scheduled visits
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of malignancy (except skin cancer) during last 5 years
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has Sickle cell disease and history of sickle cell crises since childhood. He also had the same symptoms in past two weeks treated with oxycodone which was not beneficial to his pain.
